title: How to Convert Text to Images - Intro to Deep Learning #16
excerpt: Generative Adversarial Networks are back! We'll use the cutting edge StackGAN architecture to let us generate images from text descriptions alone. This is pretty wild stuff and there is so much room for improvement. The possibilities are endless. I'll go through the architecture, code, and the implications
